code: @Converter public static CharSequence toCharSequence(final URI value) {     return value.toString(). }

@Converter public static URI toUri(final CharSequence value) {     final String stringValue = String.valueOf(value).     try {         return new URI(stringValue).     } catch (final URISyntaxException e) {         throw new TypeConversionException(value, URI.class, e).     } }
